title: To Dream - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Enemies Become Lovers   Handsome Male Lead   Selfish Protagonist   Short Story   Sickly Characters   Stubborn Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: 饕吞
description:
He had a dream in which:

The person he was most tolerant of, was him.

The person he favored the most in this life, was him.

The person he wants to stay together with the most, was him.>
